message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn to decide!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still trying to get a good chunk of the money!
You're not getting the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but not that much!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up my advantage completely!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not going to let you steal the show! Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'm not going to back down! I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
Fine, we're almost out of time! Meet me halfway and let's call it a day!
